title: Trump Tariff Exemption Process Shows Political Favoritism
summary: Academic study of over 7,000 tariff exemption requests finds firms with political connections to Trump, especially those donating to Trump or Republican causes, had significantly higher approval rates, while those linked to Democrats were more often denied. Internal government audits describe the 2018 exclusion program as "neither transparent nor objective," overwhelmed by lobbying and informal backdoor appeals.

sources.title: Politically Connected Firms Benefit From Trump Tariff Exemptions Amid Secrecy, Confusion
key_facts_confirmed: Politically connected firms received tariff exemptions with low transparency
Academic research found correlation between political donations and exemption approval
Detailed investigation of specific exemption cases

notes: Evidence shows tariff exemption system became a spoils system used to reward Trump's supporters and punish rivals
